title: Assessment: Sense Organs of the Human Body

questions.question: What are the five main sense organs in the human body?
choices: Eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and skin
Eyes, ears, heart, stomach, and brain
Eyes, feet, nose, tongue, and hair

questions.question: Which sense organ helps us see things?
Which sense organ helps us hear sounds?
Which sense organ helps us taste and enjoy food?
Which sense organ helps us smell things?
Which sense organ helps us feel things like hot or cold?
What sense organ helps us to detect light?
Which sense organ helps us differentiate saltiness and sweetness?
Which sense organ helps us to feel things by touching them?
What is the function of the sense organs?
choices: To help us fly like birds
